alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:09PM CDT until June 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LONOKE...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI AND WEST CENTRAL ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hensley Island, or 17 miles north of Pine Bluff, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Redfield... Altheimer... Humphrey... Madding... Hensley Island... Wabbaseka... Sherrill... Tucker... Gethsemane... Wright... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Tar Camp Park... Ferda... Rob Roy... F.B. Baugh Recreation Area... Bredlow Corner... Pastoria... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
